virophage.core

Class Tissue

  • java.lang.Object
    • virophage.core.Tissue
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Tissue
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A Tissue represents a collection of related cells that are modified by players.
    Since:
    2014-05-6
    Author:
    Max Ovsiankin, Leon Ren
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
